turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm Chuck. I'm trying to place a order at my local Starbucks. The Starbucks is at Park Avenue and Globeville in Denver in Colorado.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let's get that order started for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right. Thanks. I'm thinking I'm going to try a cinnamon short bread latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And a tall size and with coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, let's make it hot cuz it is a little chilly today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hot it is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so you want a tall hot cinnamon shortbread latte with coconut milk at starbucks on park avenue in denver, colorado.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right. Sounds right to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is all that information correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order has been placed and will be ready for pick up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic. I'll look for it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: please see your phone for the receipt.
